feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas to separate clauses and list items, indicating a similar punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit formal language with technical terms related to trade and global economy, suggesting a similarity in lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts contain medium-length sentences with coherent structures, contributing to a consistent pattern in sentence complexity and arrangement.

feature4.explanation: Both texts maintain a serious and informative tone, even though the topics differ, implying a shared narrative style and mood.

feature5.explanation: There are no apparent spelling or typographical errors in either text, indicating a similar level of attention to detail in writing.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistent punctuation style, formal language, coherent sentence structures, serious tone, and lack of spelling errors, there is a moderate confidence that the two texts were written by the same author.
